website_summaries.verdict: This is a comfortable and warm novelty robe that comes in vibrant and attractive patterns and colors.
pros: Comes in several different patterns and colors
Belted closure is easy to tie and adjust
Material is soft and warm without being overly thick and heavy
Length hits below knees for most men
Shawl collar is both comfortable and stylish
cons: Sleeves may run a bit long for some

customer_reviews.title: Roomy Robe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great robe. I'm a pretty big guy and was worried whether "one size" would fit okay through the chest and shoulders but this robe fit just fine with room to spare. Which means, if you are on the skinny side, you may find yourself swimming in this thing so keep that in mind. The synthetic microfiber is plush but not very absorbent so will not dry you off after a shower like a cotton robe will. All of that said, for less than $20, it would be hard to find a better robe for lightweight summer use. The retro woodlands camo pattern is novel.
customer_reviews.author: Otto Deydacht

product_meta.title: Fruit of the Loom Men's Microfleece Robe
product_meta.description: This Fruit of the Loom men's microfleece robe is perfect for relaxing and lounging around the house. Features two deep front pockets and a stylish shawl collar with long sleeves to stay warm during those cold winter months; includes a locker loop at the neck and a self belt for easy hanging and wearing.
